languages.text: "Вынужден отказать. Доминирующая директива гласит, что если глава династии объявил эвакуацию десятины, я должен уничтожить мир. Ты же объявил{mf||а} Арбитес, что увозишь сокровища. Протокол запущен, когниоковы наложены. Его не остановить".

"I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."
languages.original_text: "Вынужден отказать. Доминирующая директива гласит, что если глава династии объявил эвакуацию десятины, я должен уничтожить мир. Ты же объявил{mf||а} Арбитес, что увозишь сокровища. Протокол запущен, когниоковы наложены. Его не остановить".

traits.locale_text: "I must refuse. The supreme directive states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the world. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The protocol has been launched and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

"I must refuse. The supreme directive states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the world. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The protocol has been launched and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The protocol has been launched and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The protocol has been launched and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

"I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

languages.text: «Debo negarme. La directiva suprema indica que si {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía ha declarado la evacuación del diezmo, he de destruir el planeta. Fuiste tú quien anunció a los Arbitrator que te llevarías el diezmo. La directiva se ha iniciado y las cadenas cognitivas están activas. Es imposible detenerlo».
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

traits.locale_text: «Debo negarme. La directiva suprema indica que si {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía ha declarado la evacuación del diezmo, he de destruir el planeta. Fuiste tú quien anunció a los Arbitrator que te llevarías el diezmo. La directiva se ha iniciado y las cadenas cognitivas están activas. Es imposible detenerlo».

languages.text: “我只能拒绝。根据最高指令，只要王朝领袖确认取走帝国什一税，我就要执行毁灭行星的程序。你已经向法务官公开阐明你要运输什一税。因此，指令已经启动，认知枷锁已经就位。这个过程无法中止。”
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

traits.locale_text: “我只能拒绝。根据最高指令，只要王朝领袖确认取走帝国什一税，我就要执行毁灭行星的程序。你已经向法务官公开阐明你要运输什一税。因此，指令已经启动，认知枷锁已经就位。这个过程无法中止。”
“我只能拒绝。根据最高指令，只要王朝领袖确认取走帝国什一税，我就要执行毁灭行星的程序。你已经向法务官公开阐明你要运输什一税。因此，协议已经启动，认知枷锁已经准备就绪。这个过程无法中止。”

languages.text: 「私は拒絶しなければならない。最高命令では、王朝の当主が租税の退避を宣言した場合、惑星を破壊することになっている。租税を持って行くことをアービトレイターらに表明したのはあなただ。プロトコルは開始され、コグニ・シャックルが配置された。それを止めることはできない」
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

traits.locale_text: 「私は拒絶しなければならない。最高命令では、王朝の当主が租税の退避を宣言した場合、惑星を破壊することになっている。租税を持って行くことをアービトレイターらに表明したのはあなただ。プロトコルは開始され、コグニ・シャックルが配置された。それを止めることはできない」
「私は拒絶しなければならない。最高命令では、王朝の当主が租税の退避を宣言した場合、惑星を破壊することになっている。租税を持って行くことをアービトレイターらに表明したのはあなただ。プロトコルは開始され、コグニ・シャックルが配置された。それを止めることはできない」

languages.text: "Ich muss ablehnen. Gemäß der obersten Verfügung muss ich den Planeten zerstören, wenn der Zehnt auf Geheiß des Oberhauptes der Dynastie evakuiert wird. Ihr habt die Arbitratoren in Kenntnis gesetzt, dass Ihr den Zehnt mitnehmen werdet. Die Direktive wurde eingeleitet, die Kognifesseln sind platziert. Sie kann nicht gestoppt werden."
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss ablehnen. Gemäß der obersten Verfügung muss ich den Planeten zerstören, wenn der Zehnt auf Geheiß des Oberhauptes der Dynastie evakuiert wird. Ihr habt die Arbitratoren in Kenntnis gesetzt, dass Ihr den Zehnt mitnehmen werdet. Die Direktive wurde eingeleitet, die Kognifesseln sind platziert. Sie kann nicht gestoppt werden."

languages.text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser. L'ordonnance suprême m'oblige à détruire la planète sitôt l'évacuation de la dîme confirmée par {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie. Or, vous avez vous-même annoncé aux arbitrators votre intention de l'emporter avec vous. La directive est à présent engagée et les cogni-chaînes activées. Il est trop tard pour reculer. »
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

traits.locale_text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser. L'ordonnance suprême m'oblige à détruire la planète sitôt l'évacuation de la dîme confirmée par {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie. Or, vous avez vous-même annoncé aux arbitrators votre intention de l'emporter avec vous. La directive est à présent engagée et les cogni-chaînes activées. Il est trop tard pour reculer. »

« Je dois refuser. La directive suprême m'oblige à détruire la planète sitôt l'évacuation de la dîme confirmée par {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie. Or, vous avez vous-même annoncé aux arbitrators votre intention de l'emporter avec vous. Le protocole est à présent engagé et les cogni-chaînes activées. Il est trop tard pour reculer. »

languages.text: "Reddetmek zorundayım. Yüce yönerge, hanedanlığın başının aşarın tahliyesini duyurması hâlinde gezegeni yok etmem gerektiğini belirtiyor. Yargıcılara aşarı yanınızda götüreceğinizi açıkladınız. Protokol başlatıldı ve kavramgalar takıldı. Artık durdurulamaz."
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. The supreme ordinance states that if the head of the dynasty has declared the tithe's evacuation, I am to destroy the planet. You are the one who announced to the Arbitrators that you were taking the tithe with you. The directive has been initiated and the cogni-shackles placed. It cannot be stopped."

traits.locale_text: "Reddetmek zorundayım. Yüce yönerge, hanedanlığın başının aşarın tahliyesini duyurması hâlinde gezegeni yok etmem gerektiğini belirtiyor. Yargıcılara aşarı yanınızda götüreceğinizi açıkladınız. Protokol başlatıldı ve kavramgalar takıldı. Artık durdurulamaz."

"Reddetmek zorundayım. Yüce direktif, hanedanlığın başının aşarın tahliyesini duyurması hâlinde gezegeni yok etmem gerektiğini belirtiyor. Yargıcılara aşarı yanınızda götüreceğinizi açıkladınız. Protokol başlatıldı ve kavramgalar takıldı. Artık durdurulamaz."
